Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 71st/Lafayette
ShortDescription: Southbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temp. rerouted via 69th Red Line Terminal, 69th, South Chicago, and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 69th Red Line Terminal, 69th, South Chicago, and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Lafayette.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
